text: José Falcó Sanmartín (Barcelona, September 27, 1916 - Toulouse, May 10, 2014) was a Spanish pilot. He served as part of the Spanish Republican Air Force, who fought the Spanish Civil War, with eight official victories. He went into exile from Spain. He moved to France, a country that welcomed him and where he died. Sanmartín died from natural causes, aged 97.José Falcó Sanmartín, one of the aces of the Republican aviation, dies at 97 ==References== Category:1916 births Category:2014 deaths Category:People from Barcelona
title: José Falcó Sanmartín
